title: Campbell’s® Hearty Chicken & Noodle Casserole
directions: Heat the oven to 400°F. Stir the soup, milk, vegetables, chicken, noodles, Parmesan cheese and black pepper in a 2-quart casserole.
Bake for 30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Stir in the chicken mixture. Sprinkle with the cheddar cheese.
Cooked chicken, turkey or ham will all work in this recipe.
ingredients: 1 (14.75-oz.) can Campbell’s® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup
3 (9.75-oz.) cans Swanson® Premium White Chunk Chicken Breast in Wat; drained
3 cups Clover Valley® Medium Egg Noodles; cooked and drained (about 4 cups cooked)
